alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 26 at 2:12PM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Petroleum and Southwest Phillips Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drier air is moving in from the west, ending most snow showers this evening. Lingering flurries may still fall into tonight. Icy road conditions may still make for hazardous travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
